button.notAccount: Don't have an account? Sign up

screen.login-desc: We are very happy to see you, continue with the login and manage your applications
screen.signUp-desc: Create an account and start managing all your resources in a centralized and organized way
screen.welcome-desc: Get connected - Look for a job - Book it for yourself - Manage your time - Earn money !!!
screen.selectCountry: which country are you going to work?
screen.selectCity: which city are you going to work?
screen.personalData-desc: Enter your personal data (as they appear on your document)
screen.checkCode-desc: Please enter the security code that we sent you by e-mail
screen.accountCreatedSuccessfully-desc:
Your account has been created successfully.
Please enter the application to finish configuring your profile.
screen.documents-desc: Complete the following list of required documents in order to start working.
screen.startWorkShift-desc: Remember that when you start the turn you must finish it, otherwise you will be negatively qualified
screen.notFound-desc: The menu option was not implemented yet
screen.nonWorkingTime-desc: Records the time not worked by the operator in charge of the company.
screen.productsList-desc: Create the list of products you need to supply.

desc.PROFILE_IMAGE: This image should clearly show your face.
desc.NDI_FRONT_IMAGE: This image corresponds to the back of your identity document.
desc.NDI_REVERSE_IMAGE: This image corresponds to the back of your identity document.
